description:
Do you want to take your own Dungeons & Dragons game to the next level? Learn amazing crafting techniques to do just that. I show you how with this step by step process that you can follow to get fantastic results. This Dark Altar comes straight from the Shadows of the Dusk Queen game adventure.

Make your Dungeons and Dragons table come alive by learning these easy but amazing crafting techniques.

This project also includes Scottyâ€™s philosophy of turning trash to treasure and some of the crafting materials used have been upcrafted from syrofoam carry out clam-shells and a staples box. 

YOU WILL LEARN THESE CRAFTING TECHNIQUES IN THIS VIDEO:

-How to craft from throw away items.

-using beads to enhance your terrain.

-Using ready made materials in your project to save time and effort.

-How to use modeling paste in sculpting for gap filling and details.

-A great coating to strengthen styrofoam.

-A great way to prime your terrain without spray paint.

-Painting large miniatures with cheap craft paints.

-Using glitter glue on terrain.

-How to make easily and cheaply weighted bases for your models.

-Homemade paint wash to shade your terrain.

Visit the KOBOLD PRESS WEBSITE: https://koboldpress.com/

Pick Up the Adventure module here: https://amzn.to/2nlR8af

STOCK UP FOR THIS CRAFT! (You help the channel with every purchase)

You can pick up your Hot Wire Foam Factory supplies here. I use the sculpting tool,  Tensioner, Styrogoo and Bounce Rubberizer:  https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/home.php?bid=6&partner=32240

Black glitter glue: https://amzn.to/2MDtMMh
